original_text: The people must stand up when they are with old people. They must respect the old people. They must give honour to their God. I am the Lord your God.
korean_text: 너는 센 머리 앞에서 일어서고 노인의 얼굴을 공경하며 네 하나님을 경외하라 나는 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: when they are with old people
They must respect the old people
They must give honour to their God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 하나님께 영광을 드려야 한다

sentences.original_text: I am the Lord your God
